sentences: Petra Müllejans (born 1959 in Düsseldorf) is a German violinist, conductor and pedagogue, known especially for her work in historical performance practice and as a co-founder and performer with the Freiburger Barockorchester.
Müllejans received her first violin lessons at the age of eight in Meerbusch.
After graduation, she supplemented her training by working with Nikolaus Harnoncourt in Salzburg.
In 1987 she was co-founder of the Freiburger Barockorchester, whose musical direction she shares with her colleague Gottfried von der Goltz.
